reviewText:
Hey, I have been teaching guitar now for 24 years and this book is a good choice for day one beginners.  There are alot of duets and I find that it is best in the early stages for students to not play duets since another guitar playing something different can be distracting.

There are plenty of basic melodies and chord songs.  Make sure you are working everything to a metronome.
Contact me to schedule a free skype guitar, bass or ukulele lesson!
[...]

I have taught Guitar for years and always use this along with a book of choice for strumming,
Love the variety, even teens like the Rock pieces, Adults love Amazing Grace.
